name: guardian-of-alola
effect: Inflicts direct damage equal to ¾ of the target's remaining HP.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s
energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with
full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s
energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with
full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s
energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with
full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
